text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of Reiwa Shinsengumi. He has served in the House of Councillors since 2019. Funago was born in Gifu. He has amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS). ==References== ==Other websites== *Yasuhiko Funago profile Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese politicians Category:People from Gifu Prefecture Category:People with disabilities
title: Yasuhiko Funago
